subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Baseball
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: After declining the Red Sox’ offer of salary arbitration, Jason Varitek failed to find other suitors and returned to Boston with a one-year contract worth $5 million.
snippet: After declining the Red Sox’ offer of salary arbitration, Jason Varitek failed to find other suitors and returned to Boston with a one-year contract worth $5 million.
